divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my front yard when I looked up and saw five objecting miving from norteast to south west. They appeared to be at an altitudte that would mean they were outside our atmosphere and they appeared to be reflecting sunlight. the event took place ove a period of four to five minutes.
